sensors: Read data from an Calliope mini RGB sensor.
sensors.calliopeBuntBlue: Get RGBW values from Calliope mini RGB sensor.
sensors.calliopeBuntColor: Get RGBW values from Calliope mini RGB sensor.
sensors.calliopeBuntGreen: Get RGBW values from Calliope mini RGB sensor.
sensors.calliopeBuntRed: Get RGBW values from Calliope mini RGB sensor.
sensors.calliopeBuntSetSensitivity: Set sensivity for the Calliope mini RGB sensor.
sensors.calliopeBuntWhite: Get RGBW values from Calliope mini RGB sensor.
sensors.sensitivity: Converts the sensitivity name to a number.
